titleInfo.title: CONTINUOUS LINEAR REPRESENTABILITY OF BINARY RELATIONS

mods.abstract: A very general result on continuous linear representability of binary relations on topological vector spaces is presented. Applications of this result include individual decision making under uncertainty, i.e. expected utility theory and collective decision making, in particular, utilitaristic social welfare functions.
